features: Adjustable hood with hidden cordlock adjuster adds element protection
Signature double-stripe reflective details wrapped around each arm add visibility in low light
Articulated sleeves and underarm gussets enhance fit and add range of motion
Waist features interior drawcords for adaptable fit and warmth retention
Integrated elasticized wind skirt provides 360° coverage from the elements
Storm flap underneath 2-way zipper keeps the elements out. Unzip from the bottom for added range of motion or venting
Adjustable gusseted cuffs with snap closures keep the elements out

6 exterior pockets: 2 upper bellows pockets with top flap and hidden snap closures. 2 hip bellows pockets with top flap and hidden snap closures set on top of 2 side entry pockets with zipper closures
3 interior pockets: drop-in pocket with snap closure, 2 mesh drop-in pockets
